script:
patient_name = frappe.form_dict.get('patient_name')
patient_mobile = frappe.form_dict.get('patient_mobile')
patient_age = frappe.form_dict.get('patient_age')
patient_district = frappe.form_dict.get('patient_district')
patient_sex = frappe.form_dict.get('patient_sex')

last_name = name_parts[1] if len(name_parts) > 1 else ""

patient_doc.territory = patient_district

frappe.db.commit()

frappe.response['message'] = "Registered Successfully."

name: Auto Bill Beds
script:
ip_occupancy = frappe.db.sql("""select * from `tabInpatient Occupancy` where `left` = 0;""", as_dict=True)
if ip_occupancy:
    
    for ipo in ip_occupancy:
        ip = frappe.get_doc("Inpatient Record", ipo.parent)
        if ip.status == "Admitted":
            patientinfo = frappe.get_doc("Patient", ip.patient)
            service_unit_type = frappe.get_doc("Healthcare Service Unit Type", frappe.db.get_value("Healthcare Service Unit", ipo.service_unit, "service_unit_type"))
            patient = ip.patient
            patient_name = ip.patient_name
            customer = patientinfo.customer
            item_code = service_unit_type.item
            rate = service_unit_type.rate
            desc = service_unit_type.item
            if service_unit_type.description:
                desc = service_unit_type.description
            remark = ipo.service_unit
            practitioner = ip.primary_practitioner
            medical_department = ip.medical_department
            patient_doc = frappe.get_doc("Patient", patient)
            additional_discount_percentage= 0
            customer_group = frappe.db.get_value("Customer", customer, "customer_group")
            if customer_group == "Membership":
                additional_discount_percentage = 30

            # Initialize items for the sales invoice
            invoice_items = [{
                "item_code": item_code,
                "item_name": item_code,
                "description": desc,
                "qty": 1,
                "rate": rate,
                "amount": 1 * rate,
                "doctype": "Sales Invoice Item",
            }]

            # Add room services items and calculate total rate including them
            total_rate = rate  # start with base service unit rate
            
            if service_unit_type.room_services:
                for room_service in service_unit_type.room_services:
                    room_service_item = room_service.item
                    room_service_rate = float(room_service.rate)
                    room_service_qty = float(room_service.qty)
            
                    # Add to invoice items
                    # invoice_items.append({
                    #     "item_code": room_service_item,
                    #     "item_name": room_service_item,
                    #     "qty": room_service_qty,
                    #     "rate": room_service_rate,
                    #     "amount": room_service_qty * room_service_rate,
                    #     "doctype": "Sales Invoice Item",
                    # })
                    
                    invoice_items.append({
                        "item_code": room_service_item,
                        "item_name": room_service_item,
                        "qty": room_service_qty,
                        "price_list_rate": room_service_rate,  # e.g., 40
                        "rate": room_service_rate,                          # Let Frappe compute with pricing rule
                        "amount": room_service_qty * room_service_rate,                           # Frappe will recalculate
                        "doctype": "Sales Invoice Item",
                    })
            
                    total_rate = total_rate + room_service_rate * room_service_qty

            # Check if the patient has an insurance policy
            if patient_doc.insurance_policy:
                policy = frappe.get_doc("Insurance Policy", patient_doc.insurance_policy)
                insurance_coverage_amount = (total_rate * policy.coverage_limits) / 100
                payable_amount = total_rate - insurance_coverage_amount

                salesdoc = frappe.get_doc({
                    "patient": patient,
                    "patient_name": patient_name,
                    "customer": customer,
                    "is_pos": 0,
                    "so_type": "Cashiers",
                    "source_order": "IPD",
                    "posting_date": frappe.utils.getdate(),
                    "due_date": frappe.utils.getdate(),
                    "remarks": remark,
                    "insurance_coverage_amount": insurance_coverage_amount,
                    "payable_amount": payable_amount,
                    "doctype": "Sales Invoice",
                    "cost_center": "Main - HH",
                    "ref_practitioner": practitioner,
                    "items": invoice_items,
                })
            else:
                salesdoc = frappe.get_doc({
                    "patient": patient,
                    "patient_name": patient_name,
                    "customer": customer,
                    "is_pos": 0,
                    "so_type": "Cashiers",
                    "source_order": "IPD",
                    "posting_date": frappe.utils.getdate(),
                    "due_date": frappe.utils.getdate(),
                    "remarks": remark,
                    "doctype": "Sales Invoice",
                    "cost_center": "Main - HH",
                    "ref_practitioner": practitioner,
                    "items": invoice_items,
                    "additional_discount_percentage": additional_discount_percentage
                })

            # Insert and submit the sales invoice
            # try:
            #     salesdoc.insert()
            #     salesdoc.submit()
            # except Exception as e:
            #     frappe.log_error(f"Error while creating sales invoice: {str(e)}", "Sales Invoice Creation Error")
                
            try:
                salesdoc.insert()
                # salesdoc.save()
                salesdoc.submit()
            except Exception as e:
                error_title = f"Invoice Error: Patient {patient_name} with {patient} and Customer ID ({customer})"
                if len(error_title) > 140:
                    error_title = error_title[:137] + "..."
                
                frappe.log_error(f"Error while creating sales invoice for patient {patient} {patient_name} ({customer}):\n{str(e)}", error_title)

]

    "Healthcare Service Unit Type",
    # filters={"disabled": 0, "is_station": 1},
    filters={"disabled": 0},
    fields=["name", "floor", "ward", "description", "disabled", "service_unit_type"]
)


valid_zone_names = [z["name"] for z in valid_zones]

# Map zone name -> zone info
zone_map = {z["name"]: z for z in valid_zones}

# Step 2: Get beds that belong to those zones
beds = frappe.db.get_all(
    "Healthcare Service Unit",
    filters={
        "disabled": 0,
        "service_unit_type": ["in", valid_zone_names]
    },
    fields=["name", "disabled", "wards", "floor", "service_unit_type"]
)

# Step 3: Build response
template = request_params[0]
response = []

for idx, bed in enumerate(beds, start=1):
    zone = zone_map.get(bed["service_unit_type"], {})
    
    merged = {
        **template,
        "id": bed["name"],
        "name": bed["name"],
        "room_id": bed["name"],
        "room_name": bed["service_unit_type"],
        # "room_name":  f"rm_n-{bed['service_unit_type']}",
        "zone_id": zone.get("ward"),
        "zone_name": zone.get("ward"),
        "floor": zone.get("floor"),
        "serial_number": None,
        "description": None
    }
    response.append(merged)

frappe.response["message"] = response
